column1: Montemurlo is a comune (municipality) in the Province of Prato in the Italian region Tuscany
column2: located about 25 kilometres (16 mi) northwest of Florence and about 8 kilometres (5 mi) northwest of Prato.

column1: Montemurlo borders the following municipalities: Agliana
